mapper.select: select A.QUEST_SN , A.TITLE , A.DESCRIPTION , A.REWARD_EXP , A.REWARD_POINT , A.QUEST_TYPE , A.EMOJI , B.STATUS , FN_GET_CODE_NM('REQ_STATUS', B.STATUS) as STATUS_NM from QUESTS A LEFT OUTER JOIN QUEST_LOGS B ON A.QUEST_SN = B.QUEST_SN AND B.MBER_SN = #{mberSn} where A.USE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUEST_LOGS (REQ_DATE, MBER_SN, QUEST_SN) VALUES(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), #{mberSn}, #{questSn});
